title: Legends of the West Present: ARAMassacre
body:
**Legends of the West** are holding a **FREE** ARAM tournament this Saturday evening at 6:30PM (WAST). 

**Winners will be given festive christmas skins!**

Register today! http://binarybeast.com/xLoL1411241/join
More info: www.legendsofthewest.org

Sign up before it is too late!

replies.body:
Got any more info on how this takes place ?

Do you just all log in and receive invites ?
I wish I could join. Sounds fun. Unfortunately I am already attending a Christmas function. But good luck to anyone that participates!
